caption:
Welcome to Huff Harrington, a destination for highly curated, elegant finds that bring beauty and style to everyday life. Located in the heart of Buckhead, our Atlanta space is home to fine art, antique French furnishings, accessories, and a full-service design studio. You’ll also find us in Paris, where our newest showroom and design services bring that Huff Harrington je ne sais quoi to the City of Light. 💫

Comment ‘oui’ below to shop online or learn more about our services. We hope to welcome you soon!
